author: Special Correspondent
text:
People’ Welfare Front (PWF) leaders on Sunday launched an election campaign in Cuddalore.

The party mounted a scathing attack against the AIADMK and DMK.

The convenor of PWF and MDMK general secretary Vaiko said, “Other political parties have been dumb founded on seeing the popularity of our front. Those who have said that this front would not last long are out of their minds.”

Pointing to the extensive rain-related damages in Cuddalore district, he alleged that there was no water in the water-bodies due to heavy encroachments by the people made during the DMK and AIADMK regimes.

“We will bring Lok Ayukta Bill if we come to power. We will seize the properties of the Chief Minister and all the Ministers who are corrupt and hand them over them to be used by the public. Social justice will be protected,” said Mr. Vaiko.

Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi (VCK) president Thol.Thirumavalan said many expected that the front would fall apart but their dreams would become unreal.

“We are going to face the elections unitedly and will win in all nine constituencies of Cuddalore district,” he said.

CPI, secy R. Mutharasan and CPI-M unit secretary G. Ramakrishnan spoke.
title: Election campaign in cuddalore
